title: Crypt0S0ul
author: Crypt0S0ul
content: The accounts Are:Blue KingKhanvila78Sumonkhan14Salmankhan12Suspicion raised From Here:Quote from: suchmoon on May 31, 2022, 01:54:44 PMQuote from: Sabriya on May 31, 2022, 08:43:08 AMToday Bitcoin price $31.5k. . My guess is that Bitcoin will go back to the previous position.The current market situation is fairly good.Plagiarising merit whores are breeding now... wonderful.and hereQuote from: death_wish on May 31, 2022, 03:21:36 PMMerry-merit-go-round!Relevant here because Blue King received most of his merit in WO. :/The GoodThe merit system teaches exponentiation (iterated halving). ¬†Educational!The Badhttps://archive.ph/gGc13#selection-607.4-607.27Quote from: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3465698Bounty campaign managerThe UglyBlue King received 4 merits by abusing OgNasty‚Äôs community-oriented campaign to make ‚Äúcrypto‚Äù users do some actual cryptography stuff...https://archive.ph/nYP6U#selection-3135.0-3249.32Quote from: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=merit;u=3465698April 28, 2022, 07:15:26 PM: 4 from OgNasty for Re: [Merit] Hey Newbies! Can You Sign A Message?...soon passed 2 merits to a Sumonkhan14 post that OgNasty ignored...(A few posts down on the same page; but I like to sing messages, too. ‚ô´)https://archive.ph/nYP6U#selection-4079.0-4199.31Quote from: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=merit;u=3465698April 29, 2022, 04:53:37 AM: 2 to Sumonkhan14 for Re: [Merit] Hey Newbies! Can You Sign A Message?...then promptly received 1 merit back from Sumonkhan14.https://archive.ph/r9t9G#selection-7273.0-7435.49Quote from: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=merit;u=3465698April 29, 2022, 05:00:02 AM: 1 from Sumonkhan14 for Re: What is merit and what is it for?So, I have tried to dig a little bit. Today I noticed Mr. Blue king Send 3 Merits on This Post and another 2 Merits on this post. While Mr. Blue king Only Earned 20 Merits He had only 10 sMerit. He didn't find any other post to merit and he generously distributed 9 merits to his alts (Khanvilla78 got 5) and sent 1 To BitcoinBunny (She must be lucky).So I tried to figure out if there is any connection with those accounts. Mr. Blue king uses a Telegram Named @blueking78 Which can be confirmed from the quoted postQuote from: Blue King on June 06, 2022, 03:27:13 PMTelegram Username: @blueking78and his alts also use a similar Telegram named @blueking7 which can be confirmed from the quoted post.Quote from: Khanvila78 on June 10, 2022, 06:06:49 AMI want to work with you.But what kind of work do you do?Contact: https://t.me/blueking7He also uses another Telegram named @khanvila7Quote from: Khanvila78 on June 07, 2022, 04:32:44 AMTelegram Username: @khanvila7The Common thing he likes 78 and 7Let's Check Other accounts. With his other accounts, he participated in bounty campaigns and tried to cheat on those campaigns. Proofs below:Quote from: Khanvila78 link=topic=5392454.msg59764421#msg59764421#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username: khanvila78Forum Profile Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3439704Telegram Username: @khanvila7Participated Campaigns: Twitter, Discord, telegramBSC Wallet Address: 0x22E578Db78ec414CcD9495b40c70E2d5F05335d9Ninja: https://ninjastic.space/post/59764421Quote from: Salmankhan12 link=topic=5392454.msg59764421#msg59764421#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username: salmankhan12Forum Profile Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3439704Telegram Username: @salmankhan78Participated Campaigns: Twitter, Discord, telegramBSC Wallet Address: 0x22E578Db78ec414CcD9495b40c70E2d5F05335d9Ninja: https://ninjastic.space/post/59764477ETH Address Matched.Oh, One more thing. He also prefers 78 for this account telegram too.Three of his accounts follow the same method to earn merits: Quote from: Blue King on April 16, 2022, 11:13:55 PM Hello,, ogNasty......,,ü§î-----BEGIN BITCOIN SIGNED MESSAGE-----¬†Address: bc1qrrd4ue6trpxxk5sjpegylmvrhtjzhs2p7xcdf5Message: I‚Äôm Blue king, it's 17/04/2022 and I can sign a messageSignature: H6NsaAjxQaTKUdTNZj0WbTkMhqAkcSdA7sT+ZgbMkqf3APojYrM1pTrUqNdgu75mpGqEh59kdq0FHBAt1uKvLQw=-----END BITCOIN SIGNATURE----- ogNasty Merited this post. So he also tried with his Salmankhan12 account but ogNasty didn't respond. So, He merited this post with From Blue King account:Quote from: Sumonkhan14 on April 29, 2022, 04:31:16 AMHello,,, ogNasty..This is my first sing A Message.,......!-----BEGIN BITCOIN SIGNED MESSAGE-----Address: bc1qala909zr2j84rj4k2hc08tfjup3phtqcvnlp4yMessage: I‚Äôm sumonkhan14, it's 29/04/2022 and I can sign a messageSingnature:H7F/JSfdLKSsLicZP51CddRgB7cU6XfPeDF4mnt2PzxvdPbN+NoUDDSaBbhKYnHMHGpIs00+NQdVNpcV137/uvU=-----END BITCOIN SIGNATURE-----Yesterday, He thought why not try with Khanvila78 account?So he posted this yesterday:Quote from: Khanvila78 on June 09, 2022, 04:53:50 AM-----BEGIN BITCOIN SIGNED MESSAGE-----Address: bc1qwdj9t9rljpq22v40zpakhwuaaycqskejfevhvuMessage: I‚Äôm khanvila78, it's 09/06/2022 and I can sign a message.¬†Signature: H1WK1ZAB3HsgSoWBKE9qpLOyDkrrGx8cOEwDi0c46WY4BUU3trh1llfdHArS+0oo6+19dMG0sKrPZUWyfyVGB2Q=-----END BITCOIN SIGNATURE-----Usually, he uses all other accounts for bounty and he does it carefully. Never use the same address for multiple accounts. But, recently he decided to rank up. So he started posting on the WO thread and meriting his alts and expecting merits from others too.I don't have a problem if anyone expects merits from others. But, I guess meriting alts is unethical.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.created_time: June 10, 2022, 03:12:45 PMLast edit: June 10, 2022, 10:55:10 PM by Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Yeah, merit abuse is unethical, but nothing can be done about this. Much worse Merit abusers have gone scot-free because of Theymos' lenient approach towards Merit abuse. Since multi-accounting is also allowed, an account farm may still go unpunished.May be if you could list the accounts that cheated on a bounty, that could be a good basis to have the accounts tagged.

comments.author: _BlackStar
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on June 10, 2022, 03:12:45 PMMay be if you could list the accounts that cheated on a bounty, that could be a good basis to have the accounts tagged.If the OP can prove that all the accounts have connections and cheat on the campaign, then I suggest he post them here: Known Alts of any-one - A User Generated List Mk IV (2022 Q2) [MODERATED], if it is valid then the tag is appropriate for them.Quote from: Crypt0S0ul on June 10, 2022, 02:01:30 PMI don't have a problem if anyone expects merits from others. But, I guess meriting alts is unethical.It's true, it's unethical. You probably don't have to worry about that because for obvious reasons you can ignore the user and blacklist them. I'm sure if they abuse the merit for the 4 accounts then people will no longer get the posts they deserve.

comments.author: Apocollapse
comments.created_time: June 11, 2022, 03:11:10 AMLast edit: June 11, 2022, 03:27:11 AM by Apocollapse
comments.body: Three accounts: khanvila78, Salmankhan12, and Sumonkhan14 applied on this campaign [Bounty] 498,249% APY! Oilz Finance [BEP20] $75k $OILZ üî•üî• (no rules about multiple accounts). Both khanvila78 and Salmankhan12 cheated on this campaign üëâ {Paid} Seasonal Tokens Campaign | Budget: $50k ~ BTC | 8 weeks. ESCROWED., since only both khanvila78 and Salmankhan12 have a strong connection via address, I will give negative tag to both accounts. I wouldn't say Sumonkhan14 is involved in this accusation, same with Blue King because there's no strong proof. But Sumonkhan14 account has been banned since he got bused because of ban evasion by lovesmayfamilis. Though there are some correlation e.g. Bangladesh, merit abuse, shitposting in WO involved in this 4 accounts, but I think I will wait more longer until I make another decision.Quote#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username: salmankhan12Forum Profile Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3444534Telegram Username: @salmank78Participated Campaigns: Twitter,BTC wallet address: bc1qeam7yw2sdudz3mjj37lvcf3trult2mq2j26k3chttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5390603.msg59882548#msg59882548QuoteProof of Authentication PostBitcointalk Username: khanvila78Bitcointalk Profile Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3439704Telegram Username: @khanvila7Bitcoin Wallet Address: bc1qk0vpxs4af4ff6tdsldungyph7yfjdrxzlp3444https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5390603.msg59763211#msg59763211Quote from: lovesmayfamilis on April 30, 2022, 01:10:43 PMBan evasion.Jontokhan65 Autoban userSumonkhan14 bannedQuote from: Jontokhan65 on February 23, 2022, 05:46:47 PMTwitter profile link: https://twitter.com/GuilleVidalMxQuote from: Sumonkhan14 on March 31, 2022, 05:05:19 PMTwitter profile Link: https://twitter.com/GuilleVidalMx[ archive ]Quote from: _BlackStar on June 10, 2022, 05:42:34 PMIf the OP can prove that all the accounts have connections and cheat on the campaign, then I suggest he post them here: Known Alts of any-one - A User Generated List Mk IV (2022 Q2) [MODERATED], if it is valid then the tag is appropriate for them.Newbie and Jr.Member are not allowed post in that's threadQuoteNo "Newbie" or, "Junior Member" can post an investigation in this thread. ¬†They can however post a link (once) to a thread in the reputation section where their investigations can be investigated and analised.

Look like he also evading Ban.

comments.created_time: October 29, 2022, 09:40:01 PMLast edit: October 30, 2022, 12:59:55 PM by igehhh
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinGirl.Club on October 28, 2022, 11:33:44 AMyahoo227? ü§£Yahoo must inspired you.This is the dedicated topic for alt account connection¬†A genius. Newbies will not become alt account police on his first day at work; this alt will try to build reputation and acquire as many merits as possible before returning to the bounty section or applying for the signature campaign. This type of movement has been seen before. Yahoo62278, you must be a Hero to have someone who aspires to be you so much.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: DVlog on November 01, 2022, 03:33:25 PMIsn't there a rule for banning any imposter accountt in the forum? Nope, I doubt if there's any. Imposters are mostly just tagged by DT members, but in regard, I think it's handled case by case. How do we know for sure that he's trying to be an imposter? Unless if he sent you a tricky PM claiming that he is the original yahoo, this shouldn't be a big deal.This guy (BitcoinArena) has a very similar username to mine, but I didn't look at him as an imposter. He simply just came to do business here and perhaps when even registering, he had no idea that I existed.

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: The irony here is the title of this thread can easily be applied to the OP: Merit Abuser || Bounty Cheater || Alt farmarThe OP has highlighted a group of accounts being used to cheat the system but he himself has been using at least 4 known accounts to try to cheat the system.Hopefully all four accounts will be banned as has been requested in this thread Please permaban this scumbag:Crypt0S0ulAnotherAltnaim027and the aptly names Dic3L0v3rQuote from: Crypt0S0ul on June 10, 2022, 02:01:30 PMUsually, he uses all other accounts for bounty and he does it carefully. Never use the same address for multiple accounts. But, recently he decided to rank up. So he started posting on the WO thread and meriting his alts and expecting merits from others too.I don't have a problem if anyone expects merits from others. But, I guess meriting alts is unethical.

comments.author: The Sceptical Chymist
comments.body: Quote from: JollyGood on November 05, 2022, 01:24:50 PMThe irony here is the title of this thread can easily be applied to the OP: Merit Abuser || Bounty Cheater || Alt farmarI've developed an oddly warped sense of time--wasn't this thread started before naim027 was exposed for ban evasion?¬† Either way, I agree that it's certainly hypocritical on his part to call out others for those particular offenses.¬† The nerve of some people, you know?Quote from: JollyGood on November 05, 2022, 01:24:50 PMand the aptly names Dic3L0v3rLOL.

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: To know which was first, the date of his naim027 ban and unban needs to be ascertained.The appeal thread was created by naim027 using his aptly named Dic3L0v3r account Ban Appeal For naim027. (SOLVED), on 20th May 2022. The post he quoted that allegedly got his naim027 account the ban in the first place was dated 13th May 2022 therefore his naim027 ban took place between 13th May 2022 and 20th May 2022.naim027 created his Hello World || Welcome back again! on 12th October 2022 after being unbanned.As this thread was created on 10th June 2022 by naim027 using his Crypt0S0ul alt-account after his naim027 account received his ban, it means this thread was created by his Crypt0S0ul account after naim027 was banned under his naim027 account.I hope I articulated that correctly ¬†Quote from: The Pharmacist on November 05, 2022, 08:59:53 PMQuote from: JollyGood on November 05, 2022, 01:24:50 PMThe irony here is the title of this thread can easily be applied to the OP: Merit Abuser || Bounty Cheater || Alt farmarI've developed an oddly warped sense of time--wasn't this thread started before naim027 was exposed for ban evasion? ¬†Either way, I agree that it's certainly hypocritical on his part to call out others for those particular offenses. ¬†The nerve of some people, you know?
